name: qiita-browser-extensions
description: Web browser extensions for Qiita and Qiita:Team.

scripts.build: (rm -rf dist/chrome/* || 0) && mkdir -p dist/chrome/html && mkdir -p dist/chrome/js && mkdir -p dist/chrome/images && cp src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/chrome/html/* dist/chrome/html && cp src/chrome/images/* dist/chrome/images && browserify src/chrome/js/background.js -o dist/chrome/js/background.js

author: Ryo Nakamura <r7kamura@gmail.com> (https://github.com/r7kamura)
